ntx:prune.description: Deletes SFDX configured orgs. Default is to delete unaliased scratch orgs

alias.name: alias
alias.description: Deletes all scratch orgs and non-scratch orgs that don't have an alias

expired.name: expired
expired.description: Deletes scratch orgs that are expired

disconnected.name: disconnected
disconnected.description: Deletes nonscratch orgs with a connected status other than 'Connected'

all.name: all
all.description: Deletes any org that is expired, doesn't have an alias, or isn't Connected

ntx:spawn.description:
Creates a new scratch org,
pushes in data,
assigns a permissionset,
imports sample data,
and opens the org.

alias.name: alias
alias.description: set an alias for the created scratch org

definitionfile.name: definitionfile
definitionfile.description: path to a scratch org definition file

email.name: email
email.description: email for the created scratch org user

permsetname.name: permsetname
permsetname.description: the name of the permission set to assign

planpath.name: planpath
planpath.description: path to plan to insert sample record data
